H0.text: Rodolfo and Mimi are the main characters in which opera by Giacomo Puccini. La Tosca

H1.text: Rodolfo and Mimi are the main characters in which opera by Giacomo Puccini. Madama Butterfly

H2.text: Rodolfo and Mimi are the main characters in which opera by Giacomo Puccini. Turandot

H3.text: Rodolfo and Mimi are the main characters in which opera by Giacomo Puccini. Boheme

A4.text: the opera's libretto focuses on the relationship between Rodolfo and Mimì, ending with her death.

A5.text: Mimì tells Rodolfo that she is leaving him, and asks that they separate amicably.
